msbt.message: Oho! Curious about bridges and inclines, eh? Excellent! Becausewith the renovation of Resident Services, we have something new for getaway-package participants. This new service makes it easy and fun to add major projects such as bridges and inclines to the island. Major projects don't come cheaply, though, no, no!However, everyone who lives on the island can freely contribute toward the construction fees. We can discuss your island hopes and dreams even if you don't quite have the funds together yet. Be advised, you can only have either a bridge or an incline under construction at any given time. So consider your plans carefully before discussing them with me, hm?
Now What would you like to discuss?
Let's build a bridge.
Let's make an incline.
Demolish something.
Nothing, thanks.
Bridges and inclines, hm? How can I help you?
Let's build a bridge.
Let's make an incline.
Demolish something.
Not now.
Understood, understood. Do come back whenever you want to talk about bridges or inclines.
Oho, you'd like a new bridge, hm? Ah, yes. Bridges are a good way to connect land separated by rivers.
Go ahead and pick one from our catalog, please.
!<10_4 /> And you're sure about this? You want to proceed with this bridge?
Yes, please!
Actually, scratch that.
Excellent!<10_4 /> In that case, let's settle on a location next.Use the bridge marker kit I've placed within your pockets to set aside some land for our bridge project.
Use your kit near a river and you'll be able to imagine how a bridge will look.

Excellent! Ormaybe not? Your pockets are quite full at the moment, . I need to give you a special bridge marker kit so you can set aside a place for the new bridge. If you would be so kind, make some room in your pockets, and then come back to talk about this with me again.
My, my! Changed your mind? It is a rather large project, after all. It's a good idea to think it through.

Oh my It seems we already have 8 bridges on this island. That's about as many as our little isle can handle. If you really want a new bridge, we'll need to demolish one of the existing ones first. Then we can talk!
Oho, curious about setting up an incline? Ramps and stairs make it easier to ascend our cliffs! Yes, yes!
Go ahead and pick one out of our catalog, please.
!<10_4 /> And you want to proceed with the construction of this incline?
Yes, please!
Actually, scratch that.
Excellent!<10_4 /> In that case, let's settle on a location next.Use the incline marker kit I've placed within your pockets to set aside some land for our incline project.
You'll want a decent amount of space to use it. And make sure you're standing near the base of the cliff. When you're ready, you'll be able to imagine what your new incline will look like.

Excellent! Ormaybe not? Your pockets are quite full at the moment, . I need to give you a special incline marker kit so you can set aside a place for the new incline. If you would be so kind, make some room in your pockets, and then come back to talk about this with me again.
My, my! Changed your mind? It is a rather large project, after all. It's a good idea to think it through.

Oh my It seems we already have 8 inclines on this island. That's about as many as our little isle can handle. If you really want a new one, we'll need to demolish one of the existing inclines first. Then we can talk!

Hm? You want to demolish something?Well, I can certainly understand wanting to make the most of the space we have on our lovely island. Of course, removing a bridge or incline does come with a small demolition fee of .
Our island doesn't have any bridges or inclines at the moment, so there's nothing I can help demolish. But for future reference, demolished bridges and inclines can't be restored. So think carefully!
Demolished bridges and inclines can't be restored! So I implore you, make such decisions very carefully. Knowing that, are you still interested in demolishing something?
You bet I am!
Nope. No way.
Oh? Demolition?<10_4 /> Well, I guess we do have a number of structures on the island. This was bound to happen.
It comes down to bridges or inclines. So, what are we going to demolish?
You want to demolish ?There will, of course, be a small demolition fee of . Are you sure about this?
Well, now I don't know.
Demolish! Demolish!
You want to demolish ?There will, of course, be a small demolition fee of . Are you sure about this?
Well, now I don't know.
Demolish! Demolish!
Message received, loud and clear!<10_4 /> I'll start the necessary paperwork, and it should be gone by tomorrow.
Changed your mind, hm? Wellwe did go through all the trouble to build it in the first place. But if you decide it really does need to go, I'm here to help you with that.
Hm? What? Would you believe there isn't a single bridge or incline to demolish right now? Still, demolition is a good thing to keep in mind for when we do have such structures. It's all a cycle, hm?

Message received, loud and<10_4 /> Wait. It looks like you don't have the Bells to cover demolition costs.These things do have a price. So feel free to come back when you have the needed funds on you.
Ah, , looking for a location to install our new , yes? How can I help?
Give me pointers!
Let's not build it.
Nothing, I'm good.

There are a few things to think about when selecting a location for bridge construction. We want to get it right!It's a lot like setting up a tent. Let's start by talking a little bit about the bridge marker kit I gave you. Just find a good spot, face the river, and deploy!However, if the river is too wide or too narrow, or if the bank is uneven, it's not going to work. And thatis just about everything I know about bridge construction.

There are a few things to think about when selecting a location for incline construction. We want to get it right!It's a lot like setting up a tent. Let's start by talking a little bit about the incline marker kit I gave you. Just find a good spot at the base of a cliff, and deploy!Everything should go swimmingly as long as you have a decent amount of space to work with. And thatis just about everything I know about incline construction.
I'm excited to see where our new will go!
Oh? You want to cancel the project?<10_4 /> Well then, I'll take back the unused .
Well then, good luck on your location hunt for the !
Ah well, right now we are collecting funds in order to build our new . As such, I'm not discussing other changes, but what's on your mind?
Let's not build it.
Nothing, I'm good.
Come again? You want to halt construction of our new ? That means the donations made so far will go to waste! Are you sure about this? Really sure?
Actually, let's keep it.
Shut it down!
Understood!<10_4 /> I'll have the site cleaned up by tomorrow, then.
Understood! Donations for the project can be made with the gyroid on-site. Please help as you can.

Ah, you want to talk about bridges or inclines, hm? At the moment, I can't discuss any changes.You see, my hands are full getting things ready to build our new . We met our donation goal, and construction should be done by tomorrow. Let's talk after that!

Ah, you want to talk about bridges or inclines, hm? At the moment, I can't discuss any changes.My hands are full since we're getting ready to shut down the site for the . Everything should be taken care of by tomorrow, so let's talk after that!
